title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The Info page of the Project Properties dialog is using text fields instead of labels, which looks bad on all Motif platforms.
OB: On the Info page of the Project Properties dialog, the fields for Path, Type, etc. are created as readonly text fields.
EB: On the Info page of the Project Properties dialog, the fields for Path, Type, etc. should be created as readonly labels.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a project. 2. Right-click and choose Properties. 3. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the fields (Path, Type, etc.) are created as text fields instead of labels.
